name: Registrar and Name servers
description:
If you want to do a single grep to gather the registrar and name servers from a "whois" query, like this: -

% whois britishports.org.uk | grep -A2 "Name servers|Registrar"

Grep's -A2 grabs the 2 lines following any match.
content:
[Querying whois.nic.uk]
[whois.nic.uk]

    Domain name:
        britishports.org.uk

    Registrant:
        British Ports Association

    Trading as: 
        British Ports Association

    Registrant type:
        Unknown

    Registrant's address:
        Africa House
        64-78 Kingsway
        London
        Unknown
        WC2B 6AH
        United Kingdom

    Data validation:
        Nominet was able to match the registrant's name and address against a 3rd party data source on 10-Dec-2012

    Registrar:
        Fastnet International Ltd [Tag = FASTNET]
        URL: http://www.fastnet.co.uk

    Relevant dates:
        Registered on: 18-Oct-1999
        Expiry date:  18-Oct-2015
        Last updated:  17-Oct-2013

    Registration status:
        Registered until expiry date.

    Name servers:
        ns0.fast.net.uk           212.42.162.1  2a02:13a0:fa57:2001::1
        ns1.fast.net.uk           212.42.162.2  2a02:13a0:fa57:2001::2

    WHOIS lookup made at 10:09:13 01-Jun-2015

author: furriephillips
